original_text: King Rehoboam sent out Adoniram, who was in charge of forced labor, but all Israel stoned him to death. King Rehoboam, however, managed to get into his chariot and escape to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 르호보암 왕이 역꾼의 감독 아도람을 보냈더니 온 이스라엘이 그를 돌로 쳐죽인지라 르호보암 왕이 급히 수레에 올라 예루살렘으로 도망하였더라

sentences.original_text: who was in charge of forced labor
but all Israel stoned him to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 모든 이스라엘 사람들이 그를 돌로 쳐서 죽였다

sentences.original_text: King Rehoboam, however, managed to get into his chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 르호보암 왕은 그의 전차에 탈 수 있었고
